Reviews.Title: Not So Covert
Reviews.Author: Peregrine J. Dalziel "Not a politician."
Reviews.Content: The clock does not look like the one pictured. The clock runs on 1 AA battery but the the camera circuit needs a 12 volt power supply plugged into a wall socket. Who has a wall clock that plugs into a wall socket? Sort of defeats the purpose of being hidden. Furthermore there is a lot of room in the additional casing behind the clock. A rechargeable battery power source could have been included with this clock and easily fit into the casing. For $400-$500 you might expect a little more than this. We will be sending it back.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy Remote view with no IP Set-up Required
Connect and Record up to 4 cameras with Quad View
Get 64 plus hours of recording time with 32Gb SD card
Wireless transmission up to 700 feet with no interference
Add a Night Vision hidden camera for after dark recording
ProductInfo.Name: SleuthGear Complete Wireless Covert Wireless Internet Camera Hidden Video Surveillance System - Wall Clock
